## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G05970](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G05970)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>NEDD1</u>
- **Gene Name:** NEURAL PRECURSOR CELL EXPRESSED, DEVELOPMENTALLY DOWN-REGULATED GENE 1
- **Description:**   Transducin/WD40 repeat-like superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2153629
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
